strings: <voice_0x010017C1><se_low>Chen Mui: Hm? Is there something troubling you?
<voice_0x010017C2><se_low>Chen Mui: I see. You feel that we might be hiding something from you. Is that it, <hero>?
<voice_0x010017C3><se_low>Chen Mui: I completely understand. But would you indulge me and wait for the time being?
<voice_0x010017C4><se_low>Chen Mui: I don't want anything distracting you from your mission to bring the Lord of the Dragovians back to his senses.

<voice_0x010017C5><se_low>Chen Mui: Once you save the Dragovian Sanctuary,
I promise everything will be revealed.
You have my word.
<se_low>Chen Mui: It is late. Please, go back to your room and get some rest.

<voice_0x010017C6><se_low>Chen Mui: Awake already? How do you feel?
Did you sleep well?
<voice_0x010017C7><se_low>Chen Mui: Glad to hear it. I'm counting on you.
<voice_0x010017C8><se_low>Chen Mui: Hardly a surprise, given the gravity of the situation. But I have faith in your strength.
<voice_0x010017C9><se_low>Chen Mui: Today you will visit the Heavenly Dais.
<voice_0x010017CA><se_low>Chen Mui: The path is a labyrinth. The entrance lies beyond a portal beneath the council chamber.
